message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an introductory price of $99. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $70?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to negotiate further. How about we aim for a middle ground at $80? I believe this still reflects the value of the product while accommodating your financial situation.
